name: Exo: Arena
summary:
Exo: Arena turns a park or playing field into an augmented reality arena where you face off against your friends. Navigate virtual hazards as you run to avoid incoming fire. Bounce shots off virtual ricochets to surprise your opponents with blasts from behind. In Exo: Arena, your phone becomes your map and weapon. Last one standing wins.
Exo: Arena requires a big open space, a clear view of the sky, and a cellular data connection.
